# a [[traditional]] [[w:yunluo|yunluo]] (an ancient Chinese percussion instrument consisting of ten small, flat, tuned gongs suspended in a wooden frame)<!--keep in mind in this definition that a yunluo may have any number of gongs from 5 to 10, or even 17 or more; while the shimianluo is a specific variety of yunluo with exactly 10 gongs (the way the "12-string guitar" is a guitar with always exactly 12 strings-->
